# https://viasocket.com/

> viaSocket is an AI-powered automation platform with 2,000+ integrations. It lets users build no-code workflows, deploy AI agents, and connect apps using visual tools and MCP support. Teams can trigger actions, sync data, and automate business processes without programming, reducing manual work and scaling operations through intelligent, event-driven workflows.

## Product Overview

- [AI Workflow Automation Tool](https://viasocket.com/): AI-powered automation platform for connecting apps and automating tasks
- [Features](https://viasocket.com/features): Comprehensive platform features including AI agents, conditional logic, webhooks, and storage
- [Pricing](https://viasocket.com/pricing): Subscription plans and lifetime free access program
- [About viaSocket](https://viasocket.com/help/about-us): Platform overview, customer stories, and use cases

## AI & Automation Features

- [AI Agents](https://viasocket.com/features): Build intelligent AI agents powered by GPT, Claude, and other LLMs for autonomous task handling
- [AI Workflow Builder](https://viasocket.com/features): Create AI-powered workflows with natural language guidance
- [Conditional Paths](https://viasocket.com/features): Define specific conditions to trigger different actions in workflows
- [Storage](https://viasocket.com/features): Built-in data storage feature for managing workflow data in JSON format
- [Memory](https://viasocket.com/features): Store and recall data between workflow steps
- [Human Intervention](https://viasocket.com/features): Pause workflows for manual input and expert assistance
- [Delay](https://viasocket.com/features): Pause workflows for specified time periods
- [Web Scraping/Crawling](https://viasocket.com/features): Extract data from websites automatically

## Integrations & Apps

- [Apps & Integrations](https://viasocket.com/integrations): Browse 2,000+ app integrations across all categories
- [Integration Categories](https://viasocket.com/integrations/category/contact-management): Organized by function (CRM, Marketing, E-Commerce, etc.)
- [Request an Integration](https://viasocket.com/integrations): Request new app integrations

## Templates & Workflows

- [Workflow Automation Templates](https://viasocket.com/automations): Pre-built automation templates for common use cases
- [Popular Workflows](https://viasocket.com/): Showcase of popular automation workflows

## MCP (Model Context Protocol)

- [viaSocket MCP](https://viasocket.com/mcp): Connect AI assistants to viaSocket's ecosystem of integrations
- [Accessing n8n MCP Server](https://viasocket.com/mcp): Guide to connecting MCP with AI tools like ChatGPT, Claude, and Cursor
- [Ditch MCP, Embed Actions](https://viasocket.com/mcp/aiagent): Simpler than MCPâ€”Embed gives your AI agents native superpowers, minus the technical baggage
- [MCP for SaaS](https://viasocket.com/mcp/saas): Create and run a dedicated MCP server for your SaaS app to expose APIs, automate workflows, and connect AI agents without infrastructure overhead 

## Developer Resources

- [Build Your Own Plug](https://viasocket.com/): Create custom integrations and plugins
- [List Your App](https://viasocket.com/): Add your app to viaSocket marketplace
- [HTTP API Request](https://viasocket.com/help): Connect to external services via API
- [JavaScript Code](https://viasocket.com/help): Add custom JavaScript for flexible logic

## QuickStart
- [QuickStart](https://viasocket.com/help/quickstart): Get started with viaSocket automation platform. Learn the basics and build your first workflow.
- [Basic of viaSocket](https://viasocket.com/help/quickstart/basic-of-viasocket): Introduction to viaSocket's core concepts, features, and capabilities for workflow automation.
- [Make your first flow](https://viasocket.com/help/quickstart/make-your-first-flow): Step-by-step tutorial to create your first automated workflow in viaSocket.
- [Step by step guide to build workflow](https://viasocket.com/help/quickstart/step-by-step-guide-to-build-workflow): Comprehensive guide on building automated workflows from scratch.
- [When to choose viaSocket AI Agent, GTWY, or Hello by MSG91](https://viasocket.com/help/quickstart/when-to-choose-viasocket-ai-agent-gtwy-or-hello-by-msg91-based-on-your-problem) Decision guide for selecting the right viaSocket product based on your use case.

- [AI Tools](https://viasocket.com/integrations/category/ai-tools): Integrations with AI and machine learning platforms
- [Accounting](https://viasocket.com/integrations/category/accounting): Accounting and financial management app integrations
- [Ads and Conversion](https://viasocket.com/integrations/category/ads-and-conversion): Ad platforms and conversion tracking integrations
- [Analytics](https://viasocket.com/integrations/category/analytics): Analytics and reporting tool integrations

- [Slack](https://viasocket.com/integrations/slack): Send automated Slack messages and notifications from any workflow trigger

- [JustCall](https://viasocket.com/integrations/justcall): Automate call logging, SMS, and CRM updates via JustCall
- [SIGNL4](https://viasocket.com/integrations/signl4): Send critical mobile alerts and notifications via SIGNL4
- [IP2Location.io](https://viasocket.com/integrations/ip2locationio): Look up IP geolocation data in automated workflows

- [Zoho Cliq](https://viasocket.com/integrations/zoho-cliq): Send automated messages and alerts to Zoho Cliq team channels
- [Zoho Mail](https://viasocket.com/integrations/zoho-mail): Trigger or send emails via Zoho Mail in automated workflows

- [AidaForm](https://viasocket.com/integrations/aidaform): Trigger workflows from AidaForm online form and survey submissions
- [Youtube Transcript](https://viasocket.com/integrations/youtube-transcript): Extract YouTube video transcripts automatically in workflows

- [Youform](https://viasocket.com/integrations/youform): Trigger workflows from Youform form submissions
- [Text-Em-All](https://viasocket.com/integrations/text-em-all): Send automated mass SMS and voice broadcasts via Text-Em-All
- [Google Drive](https://viasocket.com/integrations/google-drive): Trigger workflows from Google Drive file events and automate file management across apps
- [Google Calendar](https://viasocket.com/integrations/google-calendar): Automate event creation, reminders, and scheduling workflows using Google Calendar
- [Gmail](https://viasocket.com/integrations/gmail): Trigger workflows from incoming emails or send automated emails via Gmail
- [Notion](https://viasocket.com/integrations/notion): Automate page creation, database updates, and content syncing in Notion workspaces
- [Microsoft Teams](https://viasocket.com/integrations/microsoft-teams): Send automated messages, notifications, and alerts to Microsoft Teams channels
- [Dropbox](https://viasocket.com/integrations/dropbox): Automate file uploads, syncing, and sharing workflows using Dropbox
- [Dropbox Sign](https://viasocket.com/integrations/dropbox-sign): Automate document signing and signature request workflows with Dropbox Sign
- [OneDrive](https://viasocket.com/integrations/onedrive): Trigger and automate file management workflows with Microsoft OneDrive
- [Mural](https://viasocket.com/integrations/mural): Automate mural creation and sticky note workflows in Mural collaborative workspaces
- [Yandex](https://viasocket.com/integrations/yandex): Automate workflows connected to Yandex services and data
- [Instapaper](https://viasocket.com/integrations/instapaper): Trigger workflows when new articles are saved to Instapaper
- [Trello](https://viasocket.com/integrations/trello): Automate card creation, list updates, and board management in Trello
- [Asana](https://viasocket.com/integrations/asana): Automate task creation, project updates, and team assignments in Asana
- [ClickUp](https://viasocket.com/integrations/clickup): Automate task, goal, and workspace management across ClickUp projects
- [Monday.com](https://viasocket.com/integrations/monday): Automate item creation, status updates, and board workflows in Monday.com
- [Jira](https://viasocket.com/integrations/jira): Trigger and automate issue creation, status changes, and sprint workflows in Jira
- [GitHub](https://viasocket.com/integrations/github): Automate workflows from GitHub repository events like push, PR, and issue creation
- [GitLab](https://viasocket.com/integrations/gitlab): Trigger workflows from GitLab pipeline events, merge requests, and code changes
- [Wrike](https://viasocket.com/integrations/wrike): Automate task and project management workflows in Wrike
- [Todoist](https://viasocket.com/integrations/todoist): Automate task creation and completion workflows in Todoist
- [Plane.so](https://viasocket.com/integrations/planeso): Automate issue creation and project management in Plane.so open-source workspace
- [Contentful](https://viasocket.com/integrations/contentful): Automate content entry creation, publishing, and asset management in Contentful CMS
- [Salesforce](https://viasocket.com/integrations/salesforce): Automate lead, contact, and opportunity syncing across workflows with Salesforce CRM
- [Pipedrive](https://viasocket.com/integrations/pipedrive): Automate deal creation, stage updates, and contact syncing in Pipedrive CRM
- [Freshdesk](https://viasocket.com/integrations/freshdesk): Automate support ticket creation, routing, and status updates in Freshdesk
- [Freshsales](https://viasocket.com/integrations/freshsales): Trigger workflows from Freshsales CRM lead and contact events
- [Copper](https://viasocket.com/integrations/copper): Automate Google Workspace-native CRM workflows in Copper
- [Nutshell](https://viasocket.com/integrations/nutshell): Automate pipeline and contact management workflows in Nutshell CRM
- [Kommo](https://viasocket.com/integrations/kommo): Automate messenger-based CRM and sales workflows in Kommo
- [Mailchimp](https://viasocket.com/integrations/mailchimp): Automate subscriber management, campaign triggers, and list syncing in Mailchimp
- [Klaviyo](https://viasocket.com/integrations/klaviyo): Automate eCommerce email and SMS marketing flows using Klaviyo
- [Typeform](https://viasocket.com/integrations/typeform): Trigger automated workflows from Typeform survey and form submissions
- [Jotform](https://viasocket.com/integrations/jotform): Trigger workflows from Jotform online form submissions and responses
- [Mailgun](https://viasocket.com/integrations/mailgun): Send transactional emails and track delivery events via Mailgun
- [SendGrid](https://viasocket.com/integrations/sendgrid): Automate transactional email sending and delivery tracking with SendGrid
- [Brevo](https://viasocket.com/integrations/brevo): Automate email and SMS marketing campaigns with Brevo (formerly Sendinblue)
- [ConvertKit](https://viasocket.com/integrations/convertkit): Automate email sequences and subscriber workflows in ConvertKit
- [Lemlist](https://viasocket.com/integrations/lemlist): Automate personalized cold email outreach campaigns in Lemlist
- [Apollo.io](https://viasocket.com/integrations/apollo): Trigger workflows from Apollo.io lead generation and sales engagement events
- [Stripe](https://viasocket.com/integrations/stripe): Trigger workflows from Stripe payment, subscription, and invoice events
- [PayPal](https://viasocket.com/integrations/paypal): Automate workflows triggered by PayPal payment and transaction events
- [QuickBooks](https://viasocket.com/integrations/quickbooks): Automate invoicing, expense tracking, and accounting workflows in QuickBooks
- [WooCommerce](https://viasocket.com/integrations/woocommerce): Automate order management, inventory, and customer workflows in WooCommerce stores
- [Chargebee](https://viasocket.com/integrations/chargebee): Automate subscription billing, invoicing, and payment workflows with Chargebee
- [Square](https://viasocket.com/integrations/square): Trigger workflows from Square payment and point-of-sale transaction events
- [Twilio](https://viasocket.com/integrations/twilio): Send automated SMS, voice calls, and messages via Twilio communication APIs
- [WhatsApp Business](https://viasocket.com/integrations/whatsapp-business-cloud-api): Automate customer messaging and notifications via WhatsApp Business Cloud API
- [Telegram](https://viasocket.com/integrations/telegram): Send automated messages and notifications to Telegram bots and channels
- [Discord](https://viasocket.com/integrations/discord): Send automated messages and event notifications to Discord servers and channels
- [Zoom](https://viasocket.com/integrations/zoom): Trigger workflows from Zoom meeting events and automate meeting scheduling
- [Calendly](https://viasocket.com/integrations/calendly): Trigger workflows from Calendly booking and scheduling events
- [Microsoft Bookings](https://viasocket.com/integrations/microsoft-bookings): Automate appointment and booking management workflows with Microsoft Bookings
- [Shopify](https://viasocket.com/integrations/shopify): Automate Shopify order, customer, and inventory management workflows
- [WordPress](https://viasocket.com/integrations/wordpress): Trigger and automate workflows from WordPress post, page, and form events
- [Webflow](https://viasocket.com/integrations/webflow): Automate Webflow CMS item creation and site publishing workflows
- [BigCommerce](https://viasocket.com/integrations/bigcommerce): Automate order, product, and customer workflows in BigCommerce stores
- [Box](https://viasocket.com/integrations/box): Automate file upload, folder management, and sharing workflows in Box
- [Amazon S3](https://viasocket.com/integrations/amazons3): Automate file storage, retrieval, and management workflows with Amazon S3
- [Dropbox](https://viasocket.com/integrations/dropbox): Automate file sync, organization, and sharing workflows in Dropbox
- [Google Analytics](https://viasocket.com/integrations/google-analytics): Trigger workflows from Google Analytics events and automate reporting
- [Mixpanel](https://viasocket.com/integrations/mixpanel): Automate analytics event tracking and data pipeline workflows with Mixpanel
- [Datadog](https://viasocket.com/integrations/datadog): Trigger workflows from Datadog monitoring alerts and infrastructure events
- [Segment](https://viasocket.com/integrations/segment): Automate customer data routing and event syncing across tools via Segment
- [BambooHR](https://viasocket.com/integrations/bamboohr): Automate employee onboarding, data syncing, and HR workflows in BambooHR
- [Greenhouse](https://viasocket.com/integrations/greenhouse): Automate recruitment pipeline and candidate management workflows in Greenhouse
- [Workday](https://viasocket.com/integrations/workday): Trigger and automate HR and workforce management workflows via Workday
- [Figma](https://viasocket.com/integrations/figma): Trigger workflows from Figma design update and comment events
- [Canva](https://viasocket.com/integrations/canva): Automate design creation and asset management workflows with Canva
- [Loom](https://viasocket.com/integrations/loom): Trigger workflows from Loom video recording and sharing events
- [YouTube](https://viasocket.com/integrations/youtube): Automate workflows triggered by new YouTube video uploads and channel events
- [OpenAI](https://viasocket.com/integrations/openai): Add GPT-powered AI text generation and processing steps to any workflow
- [Anthropic (Claude)](https://viasocket.com/integrations/anthropic): Integrate Claude AI for intelligent text processing and generation within workflows
- [Apify](https://viasocket.com/integrations/apify): Automate large-scale web scraping and data extraction using Apify actors
- [MySQL](https://viasocket.com/integrations/mysql): Query and update MySQL databases automatically within multi-step workflows
- [Google Sheets](https://viasocket.com/integrations/google-sheets): Automate data entry, row creation, and spreadsheet syncing with Google Sheets
- [Airtable](https://viasocket.com/integrations/airtable): Sync and automate Airtable database records across connected workflows

## Flow
- [Flow](https://viasocket.com/help/flow): Core guide to creating, managing, and scaling automation workflows inside viaSocket.
- [Create a new workspace](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/create-a-new-workspace): Set up dedicated workspaces to organize workflows by team, project, or client.
- [Manage your workspace](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/manage-your-workspace): Configure workspace settings, permissions, and organizational structure.
- [Filter and re-execution](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/filter-and-re-execution-): Filter workflow runs and safely re-execute failed or partial tasks.
- [Invite team members to your workspace](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/invite-team-members-to-your-workspace): Collaborate by adding teammates with role-based access.
- [Use AI to build workflows](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/use-ai-to-build-workflows): Generate automation flows using AI-assisted workflow creation.
- [Trigger workflows with webhooks](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/trigger-workflows-with-webhooks): Start workflows automatically from external events using webhooks.
- [Trigger workflows with webhooks (Beta Mode)](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/trigger-workflows-with-webhooks/-beta-mode): Access advanced webhook capabilities in beta.
- [Cron](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/cron): Schedule workflows using cron expressions for time-based automation.
- [In-built tools](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/in--built-tools): Overview of native tools available inside the workflow engine.
- [Looping in workflows](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/looping-in-workflows): Repeat actions dynamically with loop logic.
- [Chip](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/chip): Guide to using modular Chip components inside workflows.
- [Multi-step workflow](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/multi-step-workflow): Build complex automations with chained execution steps.
- [Drag and drop](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/drag-and-drop): Use the visual editor to design workflows quickly.
- [On/Off action steps](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/on-off-action-steps): Toggle workflow actions without deleting them.
- [Pause, reactivate and delete](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/pause-reactivate-and-delete): Manage workflow lifecycle states.
- [Duplicate flow](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/duplicate-flow): Clone existing automations for rapid reuse.
- [Bulk transfer](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/bulk-transfer): Move large volumes of data across connected apps.
- [Webhook response](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/webhook-response): Customize outgoing webhook responses.
- [Publish workflow](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/publish-workflow): Deploy workflows to production.
- [Request a new app trigger or action](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/request-a-new-app-trigger-or-action): Submit feature requests for integrations.
- [Metrics](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/metrics): Track performance and execution analytics.
- [Sync failures alerts](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/sync-failures-alerts): Configure alerts for failed automations.
- [History](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/history): Review workflow logs and execution history.
- [Error handling](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/error-handling): Implement recovery strategies and fallback logic.
- [Create and share a template of your workflow](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/create-and-share-a-template-of-your-workflow): Turn workflows into reusable templates.
- [How to use pre-built templates](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/how-to-use-pre-built-templates): Launch automations from template library.
- [Creating and using variables](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/creating-and-using-variables): Store dynamic values inside workflows.
- [Email to flow](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/email-to-flow): Trigger automations from inbound emails.
- [How to connect apps in viaSocket](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/how-to-connect-apps-in-viasocket): Connect and authorize external apps.

## In-built Tools
- [Multiple paths](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/in--built-tools/multiple-paths): Create conditional branches inside workflows.
- [Human intervention](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/in--built-tools/human-intervention): Insert manual approval steps.
- [Human intervention via Slack](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/in--built-tools/human-intervention/human-intervention-via-slack): Approve workflows directly from Slack.
- [Custom API integration](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/in--built-tools/custom-api-integration): Connect any external API.
- [Functions](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/in--built-tools/functions): Transform and manipulate data programmatically.
- [Delay](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/in--built-tools/delay): Pause workflow execution intentionally.
- [AI](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/in--built-tools/ai-): Add AI processing inside workflows.
- [Memory](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/in--built-tools/memory): Persist data across workflow runs.
- [SMTP](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/in--built-tools/smtp): Send transactional emails.
- [Break](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/in--built-tools/break): Stop workflow execution conditionally.
- [AI Agent](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/in--built-tools/-ai-agent-): Deploy autonomous AI agents inside workflows.
- [Web scraping/crawling](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/in--built-tools/web-scraping-crawling): Extract structured website data.
- [SMS](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/in--built-tools/sms): Send SMS notifications.
- [SMS functioning](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/in--built-tools/sms/sms-functioning): Configure advanced SMS behavior.

## viaSocket MCP
- [viaSocket MCP](https://viasocket.com/mcp): Overview of Model Context Protocol integration that allows AI assistants to securely interact with viaSocket workflows and tools.
- [Fair usage policy](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-mcp/fair-usage-policy): Usage limits and responsible access guidelines for MCP connections.
- [Cursor integration](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-mcp/cursor-integration): Connect viaSocket MCP with Cursor IDE for AI-assisted development.
- [Claude Desktop](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-mcp/claude-desktop): Guide to linking viaSocket with Claude Desktop applications.
- [windsurf](https://viasocket.com/mcp/windsurf): Setup instructions for Windsurf MCP integration.
- [Python client integration](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-mcp/python-client-integration): Use MCP with Python applications and automation scripts.
- [TypeScript client integration](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-mcp/typescript-client-integration): Connect MCP with TypeScript-based projects.
- [Vapi](https://viasocket.com/mcp/vapi): Voice AI integration using MCP and Vapi.
- [ChatGPT](https://viasocket.com/mcp/openai): Connect ChatGPT to viaSocket workflows through MCP.
- [Visual Studio Code](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-mcp/visual-studio-code): VS Code MCP integration guide.
- [Manus integration](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-mcp/manus-integration): Connect Manus platform via MCP.
- [Gemini CLI integration](https://viasocket.com/mcp/google-ai): Use Gemini CLI with viaSocket MCP.
- [Amazon Quick Suite MCP server](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-mcp/amazon-quick-suite-mcp-server): Amazon Quick Suite integration through MCP.
- [Connect viaSocket with Toolhouse](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-mcp/connect-viasocket-with-toolhouse): Toolhouse automation integration guide.
- [Anthropic API MCP server](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-mcp/anthropic-api-mcp-server): Connect to Anthropic AI APIs via MCP.
- [OpenAI API MCP server](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-mcp/openai-api-mcp-server): OpenAI API access using MCP server.
- [Julius.AI MCP server](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-mcp/julius.ai-mcp-server): Julius AI integration guide.
- [Warp MCP server](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-mcp/warp-mcp-server): Warp terminal MCP connectivity setup.

## viaSocket Embed
- [viaSocket Embed](https://viasocket.com/embed): Embed viaSocket automation capabilities directly inside SaaS products and internal platforms.
- [Discover the power of automation with viaSocket Integration Script](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-embed/discover-the-power-of-automation-with-viasocket-integration-script): Overview of the embed script and automation framework.
- [Native](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-embed/native): Native embedding architecture for seamless integration.
- [How native embed works](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-embed/native/how-native-embed-works): Technical explanation of embed infrastructure.
- [Benefits of native embedding](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-embed/native/benefits-of-native-embedding): Performance, scalability, and UX advantages of native embed.
- [Integration guide: SaaS AI Security](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-embed/native/integration-guide-saas-ai-security): Security best practices for embedded AI automation.
- [Authentication & Security](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-embed/native/authentication-security): Authentication flows and embedded security controls.
- [Embed pricing plans](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-embed/native/embed-pricing-plans): Pricing structure for embedded automation.
- [Steps to integrate embed](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-embed/steps-to-integrate-embed): Step-by-step implementation guide.
- [Embed FAQs](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-embed/embed-faqs-1): Frequently asked embed questions.
- [LLM FAQs](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-embed/llm-faq-s-1): FAQ covering LLM integrations with embed.

## Plugin Builder
- [Plugin Builder](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder): Framework for creating custom integrations and extending viaSocket capabilities.
- [What is Plugin Builder in viaSocket](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/what-is-plugin-builder-in-viasocket): Introduction to plugin architecture.
- [Steps to make plugins in viaSocket](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/steps-to-make-plugins-in-viasocket): Complete development workflow for building plugins.
- [Visibility configuration](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/visibility-configuration): Control plugin availability and permissions.
- [Authentication](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/authentication): Overview of supported authentication models.
- [Test your app integration on viaSocket](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/test-your-app-integration-on-viasocket): Testing and debugging integrations.
- [viaSocket OAuth](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/viasocket-oauth): Implement OAuth authentication.

### Authentication Methods
- [No Auth](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/authentication/no-auth): Plugins without authentication requirements.
- [Basic Auth](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/authentication/authentication-basic-auth): Basic authentication setup.
- [OAuth2.0 - Implicit Auth](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/authentication/authentication-auth2-0-implicit-auth): OAuth implicit flow configuration.
- [OAuth2.0 - Authorization Code](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/authentication/authentication-auth2-0-authorization-code): Authorization code flow implementation.
- [OAuth2.0 - Client Credentials](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/authentication/authentication-auth2-0-client-credentials): Machine-to-machine authentication.
- [OAuth2.0 - Password Credentials](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/authentication/authentication-auth2-0-password-credentials): Password credentials flow setup.

### Triggers and Actions
- [How to create triggers](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/how-to-create-triggers): Build custom workflow triggers.
- [Instant triggers](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/how-to-create-triggers/instant-triggers): Real-time webhook triggers.
- [Scheduled triggers](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/how-to-create-triggers/scheduled-triggers): Time-based triggers.
- [How to create actions](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/how-to-create-actions): Build custom plugin actions.
- [File upload using URL](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/how-to-create-actions/file-upload-using-url-for-all-file-types-): Handle file uploads in actions.

### Plugin Input Fields
- [Plugin input fields](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/plugin-input-fields): Overview of field architecture.
- [Static input fields](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/plugin-input-fields/static-input-fields): Fixed configuration fields.
- [Dynamic multiselect](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/plugin-input-fields/dynamic-multiselect): Multi-value selection fields.
- [Dictionary](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/plugin-input-fields/dictionary): Key-value structured inputs.
- [Dynamic input group](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/plugin-input-fields/dynamic-input-group): Grouped dynamic inputs.
- [Dynamic dropdown](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/plugin-input-fields/dynamic-dropdown): Server-driven dropdown options.
- [Dynamic help text](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/plugin-input-fields/dynamic-help-text): Context-aware UI help.
- [Hidden fields](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/plugin-input-fields/hidden-fields): Background data fields.
- [AI Field](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/plugin-input-fields/ai-field-): AI-assisted input generation.
- [API configuration](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/plugin-input-fields/api-configuration): Endpoint configuration for plugins.
- [Adding fields to actions and triggers](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/plugin-input-fields/adding-fields-to-actions-and-triggers): Attach inputs to logic components.
- [Reusable component](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder/plugin-input-fields/reusable-component): Create reusable UI/input modules.

## Free Access Programs
- [Free access for life to impactful organizations](https://viasocket.com/help/free-access-for-life-to-impactful-organizations): Overview of lifetime access initiatives supporting social and impact-driven organizations.
- [NGO Heroes Program](https://viasocket.com/help/free-access-for-life-to-impactful-organizations/ngo-heroes-program): Lifetime free automation access for nonprofits and NGOs.
- [Women Leaders Program](https://viasocket.com/help/free-access-for-life-to-impactful-organizations/women-leaders-program): Support program for women-led organizations.
- [Education Champions Program](https://viasocket.com/help/free-access-for-life-to-impactful-organizations/education-champions-program): Free access for schools, universities, and educational institutions.
- [Agency Growth Program](https://viasocket.com/help/free-access-for-life-to-impactful-organizations/agency-growth-program): Support for agencies building automation solutions for clients.
- [Influencers Power Program](https://viasocket.com/help/free-access-for-life-to-impactful-organizations/influencers-power-program): Automation access for creators and community leaders.

## Partners
- [Partners](https://viasocket.com/help/partners): Overview of viaSocket partnership ecosystem and collaboration opportunities.
- [Affiliate Partner Program](https://viasocket.com/help/partners/affiliate-partner-program): Earn referral commissions by promoting viaSocket.
- [Experts Partner Program](https://viasocket.com/help/partners/experts-partner-program): Join as a certified automation expert.
- [Billing Partner Program](https://viasocket.com/help/partners/billing-partner-program): Reseller and billing partnership structure.
- [Display the viaSocket Partner badge](https://viasocket.com/help/partners/display-the-viasocket-partner-badge-on-your-website): Showcase partnership credibility on your website.
- [Hackathon Organisers](https://viasocket.com/help/partners/hackathon-organisers): Partner program for hackathon and community events.

## Integration Guides
- [Integration Guides](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides): Step-by-step tutorials for connecting popular apps and services to viaSocket.
- [Getting Started - Jira](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-jira): Connect Jira projects and automate issue workflows.
- [Getting Started - Zoho Projects](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-zoho-projects): Integrate Zoho Projects task management.
- [Getting Started - Confluence Cloud](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-confluencecloud): Sync Confluence documentation workflows.
- [Getting Started - Zoom](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-zoom): Automate Zoom meetings and webinar triggers.
- [Getting Started - Zoho CRM](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-with-zoho-crm): Build CRM automation with Zoho CRM.
- [Getting Started - Bigin](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-bigin): Connect Bigin CRM pipelines.
- [Getting Started - Zoho Sheet](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-zoho-sheet): Spreadsheet automation with Zoho Sheet.
- [Getting Started - Zoho Cliq](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-zoho-cliq): Automate team messaging in Zoho Cliq.
- [Getting Started - Zoho Writer](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-zoho-writer): Document automation workflows.
- [Getting Started - Zoho Mail](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-zoho-mail): Email automation setup.
- [Getting Started - HubSpot](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-hubspot): HubSpot marketing and CRM automation.
- [Getting Started - Xero](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-xero): Accounting workflows with Xero.
- [Getting Started - Zendesk Support](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-zendesk-support): Automate support tickets.
- [Getting Started - Zendesk Sell](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-zendesk-sell): Sales CRM automation.
- [Getting Started - Box](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-box): Cloud storage automation with Box.
- [Getting Started - Klaviyo](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-klaviyo): Email marketing automation.
- [How to find the chat ID in Google Chat](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/how-to-find-the-chat-id-in-google-chat): Locate Google Chat room IDs.
- [Getting Started - Gorgias](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-gorgias): Helpdesk workflow automation.
- [Getting Started - Asana](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-asana): Project automation with Asana.
- [Getting Started - Zoho Books](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started---zoho-books): Accounting workflows in Zoho Books.
- [Getting Started - JustCall](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-justcall): Phone automation with JustCall.
- [Getting Started - ActiveCampaign](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-activecampaign): Marketing automation setup.
- [Getting Started - Pipedrive](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-pipedrive): CRM pipeline automation.
- [Getting Started - Bitbucket](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-bitbucket): Repository automation workflows.
- [Sangam CRM setup](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/sangam-crm-generate-token-key-and-login-url): Authentication and token configuration.
- [Getting Started - Zoho Desk](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-with-zoho-desk): Customer support automation.
- [Getting Started - Zoho Recruit](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started--zoho-recruit): Hiring workflow integration.
- [Getting Started - Zoho Campaigns](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-with-zoho-campaigns): Marketing campaign automation.
- [Getting Started - Envoy](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-with-envoy): Visitor management workflows.
- [Getting Started - Contentful](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-with-contentful): CMS automation.
- [Reconnect QuickBooks](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/how-to-reconnect-quickbooks-with-viasocket-): Troubleshoot QuickBooks connection.

- [Getting Started - Zoho Forms](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-with-zoho-forms): Form automation.
- [Getting Started - Mixpanel](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-with-mixpanel): Analytics workflows.
- [Getting Started - Livestorm](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-livestorm): Webinar automation.
- [Getting Started - Bubble](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-bubble): No-code platform integration.
- [Getting Started - Kommo](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started--kommo): CRM integration.
- [Getting Started - Fireflies.AI](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started---fireflies.ai): Meeting transcription automation.
- [Getting Started - Calendly](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started---calendly): Scheduling automation.
- [Getting Started - Zoho Marketing](https://viasocket.com/help/integration-guides/getting-started-zoho-marketing): Marketing workflows.

## Key Features

### Core Automation Features
- [Variables](https://viasocket.com/features/variables): Store and reuse structured data (numbers, text, lists) across workflow steps.
- [Functions](https://viasocket.com/features/functions): Execute custom JavaScript logic inside workflows.
- [HTTP API Request](https://viasocket.com/features/http-api-request): Connect to external APIs and exchange data with third-party systems.
- [Human Intervention](https://viasocket.com/features/human-intervention): Pause workflows for manual approval and resume execution.
- [Multiple Paths](https://viasocket.com/features/multiple-paths): Create conditional branching logic.
- [Comment](https://viasocket.com/features/comment): Add documentation inside workflows.
- [Memory](https://viasocket.com/features/memory): Persist data across workflow runs.
- [Delay](https://viasocket.com/features/delay): Add time-based pauses.
- [Break](https://viasocket.com/features/delay): Conditionally stop workflow execution.

### Collaboration & Team Features
- [Shared Workspace](https://viasocket.com/features/shared-workspace): Team-based workflow collaboration.
- [Folders](https://viasocket.com/features/folders): Organize workflows by category.
- [Contributors](https://viasocket.com/features/contributors): Track edits and ownership history.
- [Unlimited team members](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-vs-zapier-make-and-n8n-choosing-the-right-automation-tool/-collaboration-sharing-features-): No user limits on any plan.
- [Workflow templates](https://viasocket.com/automations): Convert workflows into reusable templates.
- [Real-time collaboration](https://viasocket.com/features/shared-workspace): Simultaneous editing across teams.
- [Workflow ownership transfer](https://viasocket.com/features/shared-workspace): Move workflows between workspaces.

### Triggers & Integration
- [Webhook](https://viasocket.com/features/webhook): Real-time event triggers from external systems.
- [Cron](https://viasocket.com/features/cron): Scheduled automation execution.
- [Email to Flow](https://viasocket.com/features/email-to-flow): Trigger workflows via incoming email.
- [Standard Apps](https://viasocket.com/features/standard-apps): Access thousands of built-in integrations.

### Workflow Management
- [Multi-Step Flows](https://viasocket.com/features/multi-step-flows): Chain complex automation steps.
- [Drafts](https://viasocket.com/features/drafts): Save unfinished workflows safely.
- [No-Code Workflow Builder](https://viasocket.com/features/no-code-workflow-builder): Drag-and-drop automation editor.
- [Execution Log](https://viasocket.com/features/execution-log): Full run history and debugging.
- [Metrics](https://viasocket.com/features/metrics): Workflow performance analytics.
- [Notifications](https://viasocket.com/features/notifications): Failure and status alerts.

### AI & Advanced Features
- [Ask AI](https://viasocket.com/features/ask-ai): Generate workflows using natural language.
- [AI Agent](https://viasocket.com/features/ai-agent): Deploy AI-powered autonomous agents.
- [Web Scraping/Crawling](https://viasocket.com/features/web-scraping-crawling): Extract structured data from websites.
- [Natural language workflow building](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-vs-zapier-make-and-n8n-choosing-the-right-automation-tool/-ai-advanced-features-): Describe workflows in plain English.
- [Built-in AI assistant](https://viasocket.com/features/ask-ai): Real-time workflow guidance.
- [Smart workflow recommendations](https://viasocket.com/features/ask-ai): AI optimization suggestions.
- [Integrated AI services](https://viasocket.com/features/ai-agent): Connect OpenAI, Claude, and other models.
- [Code assistance](https://viasocket.com/features/functions): AI-assisted JavaScript writing.

### Built-in Tools
- [SMTP](https://viasocket.com/features/http-api-request): Send emails directly from workflows.
- [SMS](https://viasocket.com/features/standard-apps): Send SMS messages via automation.
- [Memory Tool](https://viasocket.com/features/memory): Cross-run data persistence.
- [AI Tool](https://viasocket.com/features/ai-agent): Embed AI inside workflows.
- [Custom API Integration](https://viasocket.com/features/http-api-request): Connect any external API.
- [Web Scraping Tool](https://viasocket.com/features/web-scraping-crawling): Automated data collection.
- [Break Tool](https://viasocket.com/features/delay): Conditional termination.
- [Delay Tool](https://viasocket.com/features/delay): Scheduled pauses.

### Developer & Technical Features
- [Plugin Builder](https://viasocket.com/help/plugin-builder): Create custom integrations.
- [Webhook system](https://viasocket.com/features/webhook): Real-time triggers and responses.
- [MCP support](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-mcp): AI assistant connectivity protocol.
- [Conditional workflows](https://viasocket.com/features/multiple-paths): Branching execution logic.
- [Error handling](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/error-handling): Retry and fallback management.
- [Execution monitoring](https://viasocket.com/features/execution-log): Live performance tracking.
- [JavaScript execution](https://viasocket.com/features/functions): Custom scripting support.
- [Dynamic variables](https://viasocket.com/features/variables): Data manipulation engine.
- [API configuration](https://viasocket.com/features/http-api-request): Full integration control.

### Platform Capabilities
- [App ecosystem](https://viasocket.com/integrations): Thousands of integrations available.
- [Visual builder](https://viasocket.com/features/no-code-workflow-builder): No-code automation interface.
- [Embed platform](https://viasocket.com/embed): Native SaaS embedding.
- [Workflow templates](https://viasocket.com/automations): Shareable automation blueprints.
- [Team collaboration](https://viasocket.com/features/shared-workspace): Multi-user workflow editing.
- [Approval workflows](https://viasocket.com/features/human-intervention): Human checkpoints.
- [Drag-and-drop editor](https://viasocket.com/features/no-code-workflow-builder): Visual workflow design.
- [Unlimited steps](https://viasocket.com/pricing): No artificial workflow limits.
- [Bulk transfer](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/bulk-transfer): Large-scale data movement.
- [Workflow cloning](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/duplicate-flow): Duplicate automations instantly.
- [Folder system](https://viasocket.com/features/folders): Structured organization.
- [Audit logs](https://viasocket.com/features/contributors): Change tracking.
- [Re-execution tools](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/filter-and-re-execution-): Retry failed runs.
- [Analytics dashboard](https://viasocket.com/features/metrics): Performance insights.
- [Custom alerts](https://viasocket.com/features/notifications): Configurable notifications.
- [Beta features](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/trigger-workflows-with-webhooks/-beta-mode): Experimental capabilities.

### Competitive Advantages
- [Collaboration advantage](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-vs-zapier-make-and-n8n-choosing-the-right-automation-tool/-collaboration-sharing-features-): Unlimited team access.
- [AI advantage](https://viasocket.com/help/viasocket-vs-zapier-make-and-n8n-choosing-the-right-automation-tool/-ai-advanced-features-): Advanced AI automation features.
- [Flexibility advantage](https://viasocket.com/features/multi-step-flows): No workflow complexity limits.
- [Value advantage](https://viasocket.com/pricing): More features included by default.
- [Ease of use advantage](https://viasocket.com/features/no-code-workflow-builder): Beginner-friendly design.

## Use Case Categories

### By Department/Team
- [Human Resources](https://viasocket.com/departments/human-resources): Streamline hiring, onboarding, and employee operations across systems.
- [Finance and Accounting](https://viasocket.com/departments/finance-and-accounting): Connect billing, approvals, and reporting without manual follow-ups.
- [Marketing](https://viasocket.com/departments/marketing): Move leads, data, and campaigns smoothly across your marketing stack.
- [Sales](https://viasocket.com/departments/sales): Keep deals, contacts, and handoffs in sync from first touch to close.
- [Operations](https://viasocket.com/departments/operations): Coordinate processes across teams to keep daily work running smoothly.
- [Information Technology](https://viasocket.com/departments/information-technology): Manage access, systems, and internal requests through connected workflows.
- [Legal](https://viasocket.com/departments/legal): Track reviews, approvals, and documents across teams and tools.
- [Customer Service and Support](https://viasocket.com/departments/customer-service-and-support): Route tickets, updates, and escalations without breaking context.
- [Product Development and Engineering](https://viasocket.com/departments/product-development-and-engineering): Sync product workflows across planning, delivery, and feedback loops.
- [Research and Development](https://viasocket.com/departments/research-and-development): Move insights, experiments, and outcomes across tools and teams.
- [Procurement and Purchasing](https://viasocket.com/departments/procurement-and-purchasing): Automate requests, approvals, and vendor workflows end to end.
- [Quality Assurance and Control](https://viasocket.com/departments/quality-assurance-and-control): Track checks, issues, and resolutions across systems.
- [Business Development](https://viasocket.com/departments/business-development): Coordinate partnerships, leads, and follow-ups without manual tracking.
- [Compliance](https://viasocket.com/departments/compliance): Maintain audit trails and approvals across departments.
- [Administration](https://viasocket.com/departments/administration): Handle internal requests and processes without constant coordination.
- [Public Relations](https://viasocket.com/departments/public-relations): Align outreach, approvals, and communications across teams.
- [Risk Management](https://viasocket.com/departments/risk-management): Monitor signals and responses across systems in one flow.

### By Use Case Type

#### Lead Management & Sales
- Automate lead capture from forms and ads
- Sync contacts between CRM and marketing tools
- Track deal progression and send notifications
- Auto-assign leads based on territory or criteria
- Generate quotes and proposals automatically

#### Customer Support & Service
- Route support tickets to the right team
- Escalate urgent issues automatically
- Sync customer data across helpdesk and CRM
- Send automated follow-ups after ticket resolution
- Track SLA compliance and send alerts

#### Marketing Automation
- Sync email campaign data with CRM
- Trigger personalized email sequences
- Track ad campaign performance across platforms
- Auto-post content to social media channels
- Generate marketing reports automatically

#### HR & Recruitment
- Automate candidate screening and scheduling
- Sync employee data across HR systems
- Trigger onboarding workflows for new hires
- Manage time-off requests and approvals
- Send automated reminders for reviews

#### Finance & Accounting
- Automate invoice generation and sending
- Sync payment data between platforms
- Trigger approval workflows for expenses
- Reconcile transactions automatically
- Generate financial reports on schedule

#### Operations & Project Management
- Sync tasks across project management tools
- Auto-create tickets from customer requests
- Track project milestones and send updates
- Coordinate cross-team workflows
- Automate status reporting

#### E-commerce & Retail
- Sync orders between store and fulfillment
- Update inventory across platforms
- Trigger shipping notifications
- Manage customer returns workflow
- Track product reviews and feedback

#### IT & DevOps
- Automate user provisioning and access
- Monitor system alerts and create tickets
- Sync code repositories with project tools
- Deploy workflows based on git events
- Track infrastructure changes

### By Complexity Level

#### Beginner Workflows
- [Simple data sync](https://viasocket.com/automations): Copy data between two apps automatically
- [Email notifications](https://viasocket.com/automations): Send alerts when events occur
- [Form to spreadsheet](https://viasocket.com/automations): Save form submissions to sheets
- [Social media posting](https://viasocket.com/automations): Auto-post content across platforms
- [Basic lead capture](https://viasocket.com/automations): Collect leads from forms to CRM

#### Intermediate Workflows
- [Multi-step approvals](https://viasocket.com/features/human-intervention): Route requests through approval chains
- [Conditional routing](https://viasocket.com/features/multiple-paths): Branch workflows based on criteria
- [Data transformation](https://viasocket.com/features/functions): Modify data between systems
- [Scheduled reports](https://viasocket.com/features/cron): Generate and send reports automatically
- [Cross-platform sync](https://viasocket.com/integrations): Keep data synchronized across 3+ apps

#### Advanced Workflows
- [AI-powered automation](https://viasocket.com/features/ai-agent): Build intelligent agents for complex tasks
- [Custom API integrations](https://viasocket.com/features/http-api-request): Connect proprietary systems
- [Complex multi-branch logic](https://viasocket.com/features/multiple-paths): Sophisticated conditional workflows
- [Bulk data operations](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/bulk-transfer): Process large datasets efficiently
- [Error handling & retry logic](https://viasocket.com/help/flow/error-handling): Build fault-tolerant workflows

### By Industry

#### SaaS & Technology
- User onboarding automation
- Trial-to-paid conversion workflows
- Customer health scoring
- Feature usage tracking
- Churn prevention workflows

#### E-commerce & Retail
- Order fulfillment automation
- Inventory synchronization
- Customer review management
- Abandoned cart recovery
- Multi-channel selling workflows

#### Professional Services
- Client intake and onboarding
- Project kickoff automation
- Time tracking and billing
- Document approval workflows
- Client communication automation

#### Healthcare & Medical
- Patient appointment scheduling
- Medical record updates
- Insurance verification workflows
- Prescription refill automation
- Patient follow-up reminders

#### Education & Training
- Student enrollment workflows
- Course completion tracking
- Assignment grading automation
- Parent communication systems
- Event registration management

#### Real Estate
- Lead qualification and routing
- Property listing syndication
- Showing scheduling automation
- Contract management workflows
- Client communication tracking

#### Financial Services
- Loan application processing
- KYC verification workflows
- Transaction monitoring
- Compliance reporting
- Client portfolio updates

#### Manufacturing
- Production order tracking
- Quality control workflows
- Supply chain coordination
- Equipment maintenance alerts
- Inventory replenishment

### Common Automation Patterns

#### Data Synchronization
Keep information consistent across multiple systems in real-time without manual data entry.

#### Approval Workflows
Route requests through stakeholders for review and approval with automatic escalation.

#### Notification & Alerting
Send timely alerts to teams via email, Slack, SMS, or other channels based on triggers.

#### Scheduled Tasks
Run recurring operations like reports, backups, or data cleanup at specified intervals.

#### Event-Driven Actions
Trigger workflows automatically when specific events occur in connected applications.

#### Data Enrichment
Enhance records with additional information from external sources or APIs automatically.

#### Multi-System Orchestration
Coordinate complex processes that span multiple departments and tools seamlessly.

#### Audit & Compliance
Maintain automated logs, approval trails, and compliance documentation across workflows.

## Support Resources
- [Documentation](https://viasocket.com/help): Complete knowledge base covering workflows, integrations, troubleshooting, and advanced automation guides.
- [Support Center](https://viasocket.com/help/others/support): Official help portal for technical assistance, account issues, and platform troubleshooting.
- [Direct Support](https://viasocket.com/support): Contact viaSocket support team for real-time help and issue resolution.
- [Expert Services](https://viasocket.com/experts): Hire certified automation experts to design, build, and optimize workflows.
- [Partner Program](https://viasocket.com/help/partners): Join partnership programs for affiliates, agencies, and automation professionals.
- [Beta Testing Program](https://viasocket.com/help/others/apply-as-beta-tester-for-viasocket): Apply for early access to new features and experimental tools.
- [Lifetime Free Access Programs](https://viasocket.com/help/free-access-for-life-to-impactful-organizations): Special access initiatives supporting NGOs, educators, creators, and impact-driven organizations.
- [Community](https://viasocket.com/community/): Connect with automation users, share workflows, and learn best practices.
- [Schedule a Support Call](https://cal.id/team/viasocket/superheros): Book a live session with the support or onboarding team.
- [Sales Assistance](https://calendly.com/rpaliwal71/15-mins): Talk with sales for pricing, enterprise onboarding, and custom plans.

## Contact
- [Support](https://viasocket.com/help/others/support): Reach the official support team for technical help, troubleshooting, and account assistance.
- [Request new integrations](https://viasocket.com/integrations): Submit requests for new app integrations, triggers, or actions.
- [Apply as partner](https://viasocket.com/help/partners): Join viaSocket partner programs for affiliates, agencies, and ecosystem collaborators.
- [Apply as expert](https://viasocket.com/experts): Become a certified automation expert and offer professional services.
- [Schedule a call](https://cal.id/team/viasocket/superheros): Book a direct conversation with the viaSocket team.
- [Sales contact](https://calendly.com/rpaliwal71/15-mins): Talk to sales for onboarding and enterprise support.
- [Community](https://viasocket.com/community/): Join the public community for discussions and updates.
